name: EvolutionChess
description:
NOTE: The web version is naturally slower compared to the downloaded versions. This is a result of WebAssembly being unable to utilize multiple threads. The web version is also unable to play multiplayer. If you want to play with friends, please download the appropriate build.

An innovative variant of chess involving a random upgrade system, brand new piece movements and abilities, and a dynamic game flow.

Controls:

[Singleplayer & Multiplayer]
Left click - Pickup/Drop piece + Show regular moves
Right click - Show upgraded moves

[Single-player Only]
R - Reset board
E - Upgrade piece

[Multi-player Only]
Escape - Leave game
